title: Mottox3 Anata no Omocha
original_name: もっと ×3 あなたのおもちゃ
sinopse: Rui is an ordinary female college student. Her boyfriend Renji is No.1 popular host at a club!! The two are imbalanced in every respect, but they love each other very much. One day, however, Renji unexpectedly says good-bye!? There seems some reason...? This comic book is the 4th in the series "Anacha.
